title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, it is not expected behavior for the application to produce a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI option.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText, the application produces a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: The application should not produce a beep sound when choosing SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText. Clicking on other buttons should not result in a beep sound either.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open ControlExampleText application. 
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option. 
3. Notice the beep sound produced. 
4. Try clicking on other buttons and observe if the beep sound is triggered again.
